msg: Start process of completely removing XMLUtils (in favor of either StaxUtils for IO or DOMUtils for DOM related stuff)

author: stsp
msg: In svnauth, use a token map for SSL cert keys to make some strings easier
to translate. We can now mark entire output lines for translation, rather
than marking only parts of lines for translation which were then used in
(show_cert_info): Remove the cert_info_key_map parameter. Iterate over keys
in the cert_info_key_map, and look up corresponding tokens to identify the
display name to use for the key. Then print the key and value in one go.
This way, the string marked for translation covers a whole line.
(show_ascii_cert): No need to build up a cert_info_key_map here anymore.
Adjust calls to show_cert_info() to account for removed parameter.
